results.name: 100 Year Old Drivers Rebooted
results.shortDescription: Another look at some of the nation's oldest drivers, including 102-year-old Harry Kartz.
results.longDescription: Another look at some of the nation's oldest drivers, including 102-year-old Harry Kartz who is determined to stay on the road - despite being barely able to hear.

results.name: 1000 Heartbeats
results.shortDescription: Quiz show in which contestants have their heart rate constantly monitored.
results.longDescription: Quiz show.  If contestants complete seven rounds before their heart beats 1,000 times, they could win a jackpot of 25,000 pounds.

results.name: 1966 - A Nation Remembers
results.shortDescription: Documentary celebrating the 50th anniversary of England hosting and winning the World Cup.
